FULL TITLE :
SHORT TITLE : Truth Behind Plaza Miranda Bombing
ABSTRACT : Rep. Atienza... stood up to speak on the same event on August 21, 1971 wherein he, gladly stood up in front of the people in Plaza Miranda to be proclaimed as candidates of the Liberal Party when the bombing took place; averred that the years in between have shown that the late former Pres. Ferdinand E. Marcos had nothing to do with said bombing, and that acc. to research,...it was Jose Maria Sison who masterminded the whole thing...; spoke about the assassination of former Senator Benigno “Ninoy” Aquino Jr. also on August 21 and wondered why despite having had two Aquino Administrations, no one seemed interested in speaking about the issues during said administrations,...; expressed his support for the burial of former Pres. Marcos in the Libingan ng mga Bayani...(House Journal No.13,p.12-13)
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ATIENZA, JOSE JR. L.
